UIEventInitUIEvent.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The UIEvent.initUIEvent() method initializes a UI event
once it's been created.

remarks.para:
Events initialized in this way must have been created with the {{
domxref("Document.createEvent()") }} method. This method must be called to set the event
before it is dispatched, using . Once
dispatched, it doesn't do anything anymore.

blockquote.para: Warning: Do not use this method anymore as it is deprecated.
Instead use specific event constructors, like . The page on Creating and triggering events gives more information about the way to use these.

remarks.para:
-
-The constructor to use instead of this deprecated method:
. More specific constructors can be used
too.
